data.name: Dyflexion Demo
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lowest Graphics Settings

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.3 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 730
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lowest Graphics Settings
